CustomField.description:
Formula that uses the Contact Ops Notes if available. If the member is a Lead, then the Ops Notes on the Lead is used.
In System Use: Layout and Reports
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula that uses the Contact Ops Notes if available. If the member is a Lead, then the Ops Notes on the Lead is used.
CustomField.label: Ops Notes from Related
